summary: This mod adds a magic stick of light ( = Mage Torch ).
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]This mod adds an animated magic stick of light ( = Mage Torch ).

It is much brighter and also a little longer than a normal torch.

You can either pick it up in the Arch-Mage's Quarters or buy it from Collette at the College.

Credits:
[/size][list]
[*][size=4]Bethesda for the original meshes/textures[/size]
[/list][list]
[*][size=4]NifSkope people for creating NifSkope[/size]
[/list][size=4]
[/size]
author: TheSecretMaster
